front.title: Routing Architecture for the Next Generation Internet (RANGI)

abstract.t: IRTF Routing Research Group (RRG) is exploring a new routing and addressing architecture to address the issues with the current Internet, e.g., mobility, multi-homing, traffic engineering, and especially the routing scalability. This document describes a new identifier (ID)/locator split based routing and addressing architecture, called Routing Architecture for the Next Generation Internet (RANGI), in an attempt to deal with the above problems.
